item.title: cs-retrospect
item.description: 了解一件事，首先： why what how properties of a true high-level language Elegance: there is a simple, easily understood relationship between the notation used by a high-level language and the concepts expressed. Abstraction: each expression in a high-level language describes one and only one concept. Concepts may be described independently and combined freely. Power: with a high-level language, any precise and complete description of
